title: Drawing, Design for Semi-Circular Writing Table of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Semi-Circular Writing Table of Mahogany and Inlay
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Semi-circular table top with inlaid central horizontal panel having 2 short drawers with single C-shaped pulls; raised on 4 straight, tapering legs terminating in molded square feet.  Rear of top has conforming section consisting of inlaid central panel flanked by 4 short drawers and small horizontal drawer on either end of section.  Low railing at back.  Vase, lamp, and inkwell on top.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Semi-Circular Writing Table of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-246
